fields.title: FINCONNECT
fields.sub_title: One Stop Solution for Finance Industry Integration Demands
fields.description: Discover FinConnect, a licensed MIDDLEWARE solution with automated Open Banking APIs, Microservices architecture, and 250+ banking services. Unleash its tech edge with top-notch security and availability.

fields.title: INTERNET BANKING
fields.description: Harness ML-assisted Plug-N-Play Online Banking for seamless customization, modernize legacy apps with microservices for cost-effective scalability.

fields.title: CONSENT MANAGEMENT
fields.sub_title: Secure Microservices, Customizable APIs, Scalable Banking Portal for Lifecycle Management
fields.description: Self-service, governance-enabled API platform for tailored business needs, with strong authentication, authorization, and vigilant anomaly monitoring for enhanced security.

fields.title: CIS
fields.description: An integrated, consolidated, and comprehensive record and document storage system that enables access to multiple channels through a single portal.

fields.title: RTP Manager
fields.sub_title: eal-Time Payment Processor & Transaction Management Hub
fields.description: RTP processor & PTM enables participant banks to interoperate with the central bank and avail benefits to their customers by initiating instant payments without directly relying on account information.

fields.title: VUFORA
fields.description: An online platform built with the features you need to successfully host and manage your events, saving valuable time and eliminating boredom and frantic manual processes.An online platform built with the features you need to successfully host and manage your events, saving valuable time and eliminating boredom and frantic manual processes.

fields.title: SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORM
fields.sub_title: Multi-Channel Hub: WhatsApp, SMS, Email, Push, Automation, Chat
fields.description: Automated communication system cuts costs, delivers notices via email, text, PDF, saving time.

fields.title: CROWD FUNDING
fields.sub_title: Revolutionizing SME Financing: Connect, Invest, Grow
fields.description: A comprehensive crowd-funding platform, e-investment gate and m-investment gate, to connect ambitious Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) with potential investors, democratizing access to capital and fueling their growth journey.

fields.title: About Impulse Idea
fields.description: At Impulse Idea, we are more than just a technology company - we are innovators, disruptors, and problem solvers. With a relentless commitment to excellence and a passion for pushing boundaries, we strive to decode and enhance businesses through tailored solutions and unparalleled service. Join us on our journey to redefine the future of technology and empower businesses to thrive in the digital age.

fields.title: Our Mission
fields.description: Our mission is to decode and enhance businesses by crafting tailored solutions that boost productivity. We guide our diverse clients, helping them surpass their business objectives through innovative solutions and services.

fields.title: Our Vision
fields.decsription: We envision ourselves as a proficient IT team, fearlessly addressing enterprise challenges through continuous knowledge acquisition and skill refinement.

fields.title: Key Achievements
fields.description: Explore our journey of success: 73+ projects delivered, 95% customer retention, 200% skilled resources, serving 50+ clients across multiple regions, and recipient of the 'Excellence in Fintech Solutions' Finnovex Award Qatar 2022.

fields.title: Primary Objectives
fields.description: At Impulse Idea, our primary objectives are to captivate new customers, conquer cloud realms, and empower customer experiences through innovative solutions and services.
